name: Renew My Space
description:
I find that our space is often a good reflection of us, as the items found hold stories and memories which offer insight into who we are as a person.

In Renew My Space, you help Lia reorganize her space filled with items are that represent Lia's dreams.

This story is heavily inspired by the experiences of myself and those around me. I hope that Renew My Space will inspire you to reorganize and renew your mind palace as well.

Grace – Developer, Narrative
Jane – 2D Art, Narrative

Special thanks to my friends who shared their experiences!
